column1: Stem Cell & Regenerative Therapies: From Bench to Market MSc
column5: The first course of its kind in the UK, the Stem Cell & Regenerative Therapies: From Bench to Market MSc combines biological and medical science with business, law and bioethics. Designed to develop expertise in the biological, commercial and regulatory aspects of cellular therapies and its applications in biomedicine, the course equips students to pursue a business-based career in cellular therapy or related
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
